channel.description: Recent content in Architecture on Ozone

item.title: Overview
item.description: Ozone’s overview and components that make up Ozone.

item.title: Ozone Manager
item.description: Ozone Manager is the principal name space service of Ozone. OM manages the life cycle of volumes, buckets and Keys.

item.title: Storage Container Manager
item.description: Storage Container Manager or SCM is the core metadata service of Ozone. SCM provides a distributed block layer for Ozone.

item.title: Containers
item.description: Description of the Containers, the replication unit of Ozone.

item.title: Datanodes
item.description: Ozone supports Amazon’s Simple Storage Service (S3) protocol. In fact, You can use S3 clients and S3 SDK based applications without any modifications with Ozone.

item.title: Ozone S3 Gateway
item.description: Apache Ozone’s S3 Gateway (often called S3G) is a component that provides an Amazon S3-compatible REST interface for Ozone’s object store.

item.title: Recon
item.description: Recon serves as a management and monitoring console for Ozone.

item.title: Network Ports
item.description: Understanding and correctly configuring the network ports used by Apache Ozone is essential for the successful deployment, operation, and maintenance of Apache Ozone clusters.
